attributes.action: Bring Back the death penalty for Murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gun and Knife crime is out of control.Feral teenagers kill OAP's and others without fear of retribution.British Terrorists plant bombs on our trains and on our local bus. Please surport me.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
